title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM, chat or embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark/light themes, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby wrapper around the REST API with streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code with inline completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chat UI that streams responses from Ollama; deploy to Vercel in one click.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose stacks including GPU support, Open-WebUI sidecar, and model caching volumes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG apps with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain in under 50 lines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; same API as ollama-js repo, published automatically.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package mirrored from ollama-python repo; install via pip.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed, async tokio client with serde models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ with async streams and dependency injection.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama; small surface, context cancellation, and native Go streams.
